body.name: NutriChef Air Fryer, Halogen Infrared Convection Oven - Large 13 Quart Glass Air Fryer, Oil-Free Quick Healthy Meals Multicooker with Time & Temperature Controls, Roast, Fry, Toast or Crisp
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 6 hrs 36 mins
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 6 hrs 36 mins
features: AIR FRYING MADE EASY: Simply insert food into the hot air fryer, set the time and temperature and cook your ingredients efficiently and most importantly, healthily..High Powered Heating Element: 1200 Watt | Temperature Settings: 149°F - 482°F | Maximum Time Setting: 60 MinutesCooking Bowl Size (L x H): 13.0'' x 6.7'' | Cooking Bowl Capacity: 13+ Quarts

VERSATILE USE: The air fryer toaster oven has the ability to defrost, broil, roast, bake, steam, grill, and BBQ. Perfect for chicken, steak, ribs, fish, shrimp and more. No need to preheat or defrost frozen meat for the best flavor and taste.
HEALTHIER ALTERNATIVE: The infrared convection toaster oven was laboratory tested to prepare healthier meals more efficiently. The air fryer convection oven requires little to no oil added.
BETTER THAN TRADITIONAL FRYING: The air fryer oven is safer than the outdated method of a deep fry pan and basket. Rapid air circulation makes this style of rack cooking optimal.

PERFECTLY CRISPED: The oven air fryer cooks your food brown and crispy on the outside and keeps its moist on the inside without the excessive use of oils that contains too much fat. Perfect for making fries and chips.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: NutriChef Halogen Cooking Convection Oven Healthy Kitchen Countertop Cooking NutriChef’s Halogen Cooking Convection functions as a conventional oven does but with better, faster and energy saving way. There’s no need to preheat, defrost or thaw frozen meat for the best flavor and taste. It also cooks your food brown and crispy on the outside and keeps its moist on the inside without the excessive use of oils that contains too much fat. NutriChef’s Halogen Cooking Convection Oven has been chosen by many consumers because of its multi-functionality. That it can be used for reheating leftover foods, grilling, roasting, broiling, baking and more. In spite of its compact size it has a high powered heating element of 1200 Watts. It’s powerful enough to handle a wide variety of needs of its user. The patented process that the NutriChef’s Halogen Cooking Convection Oven can cook has been a common reason for the highest level of satisfaction of its users. Technical Specs High Powered Heating Element: 1200 Watt Temperature Settings: 149°F - 482°F Maximum Time Setting: 60 Minutes Cooking Bowl Size (L x H): 13.0'' x 6.7'' Cooking Bowl Capacity: 13+ Quarts Power Cord Length: 3.3’ Ft. Power: 240V

Key Features Prepares Healthier Foods Than Traditional Frying Deep frying foods in oil with high temperature involved can lead to certain diseases. While NutriChef’s Halogen Cooking Convection requires little to no oil added which does not cause any reaction on food which makes it healthier. Excellent for Chicken, Steak, Ribs, Fish, Shrimp & More Have your roasted chicken, steak, ribs, fish, shrimp and more on Sunday dinner ready in no time at all with NutriChef. It keeps all the juices and moisture during the cooking process but have the lovely crispy skin on the outside that you associate with conventional roasting. Prepare Great Tasting Crispy Skins, Perfect for Fries NutriChef’s Halogen Cooking Convection Oven makes cooking your favorite fries or chips a lot easier whether it’s ready-made or home cooked. It’s also safer than the old method of a deep pan and basket.

Prepare Healthier Meals, Quicker! NutriChef’s Halogen Cooking Convection Oven cooks your food up to 60 percent faster than the conventional oven. It doesn’t give hot and cold spots on your food or uneven cooking like the microwave. It’s also drains the fat away from your food which make it very healthy. Stain Resistant & Easy-to-Clean Stainless Steel Cooking Bowl Cleaning the cooking bowl of NutriChef’s Halogen Cooking Convection Oven is easy as it can be detached from the unit and then cleaned in a sink or dishwasher. Achieve Tasty & Low Fat Foods with Benefits Using NutriChef’s Halogen Cooking Convection Oven is a great way to stick to a low fat diet. It eliminates the need for greasy oils or cooking sprays. And helps remove fat from your food. It locks the moisture in but melts away the fat, leading to a healthy and delicious meal. Convenient See-Through 360° View Glass Lid Cover NutriChef’s Halogen Cooking Convection Oven provides an unobstructed 360 degree view of what’s inside so you’ll know exactly in case when something starts to burn.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ease of use and build quality
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. The NutriChef air fryer has been a game-changer in my kitchen. Its cooking performance is impressive, delivering crispy and delicious results with minimal oil. The temperature control is precise and The build quality is solid. Cleaning is relatively easy, and overall, it's a valuable addition for healthier cooking without sacrificing flavor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars How to used.
reviews.reviewText: Iit is good easy to use for bbq.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’m not sure if my bowl was chipped on arrival or it happened during my ownership. I suspect the latter. But the important thing is that I noticed it about 2 weeks into use. It’s bothersome from a safety in cleaning ( it could produce a slight scratch or cut to the finger), durability (what will it look like in 12 months?) and also food hygiene (can bits of glass be mixed with my food at some point?)I called Amazon Customer Service (CS) and they put me through to the manufacturers chat (CS) who the said I bought Asurion warranty. That whole process although easy to type took way too long in real life. Anyway, I’m yet to call Asurion and see what they offer.Re flavour - not sure how this is relevant to the appliance but I didn’t notice a loss or enhancement if flavour.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It cooks very smooth
reviews.reviewText: It's a bit heavy but it's because it's spacious & made out of glass but it works great & you barely hear it cooking, and the fact you can see the food cooking it's awesome.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Healthy and attractive

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best air fryer on the market
reviews.reviewText: This is the best air fryer on the market and I have tried a couple others. I especially like the Large Glass bowl you put the food in. It can hold a Whole chicken and it has a rotisserie rack so you can make your own rotisserie chicken. Washes clean easily and comes with 2 stainless steel racks that stack on top of each other so you can layer the food inside.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Does not work
reviews.reviewText: Received it yesterday. Watched several videos, read instructions thoroughly, and then tried making chicken. Two hours later, chicken was still raw. I ended up using the oven. So disappointed 😞. I will be returning as I don't have time to deal with customer service.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love how big it is and I can see my food while it's cooking.

For full disclosure, it would be better to include this in description since there is a sticker in the product.Great functionality but will return it. I was buying a glass air fryer to avoid toxicity of non-stick air fyers... not to be exposed to another toxin. No, thank you!

reviews.reviewTitle: great way to cook your food.
reviews.reviewText: bought this to replace broken flavorwave top. bowel is much lighter than FW, no reflector in bottom like FW, no side support top holder like FW.Plus's: fits FW bowel. has fryer extension ring which is ++++ for fries and shrimp, steak, chops, etc. which is a great idea. ring gives much more room inside oven and you can cook fries at the same time ++++. cord does detach so my wife likes that idea. ++++. My wife loved the FW so being so similar, it should cook equally well. we also have the braun air fryer but the braun does not have a large enough cooking area but does fries, steaks, chops very well. all of these convection ovens use quartz halogen bulbs which are a pain to replace as the screws get distorted over time. we will continue to use the FW bowel as it is much thicker but over all my wife just loves these type of ovens. I like not running the oven during peak hydro times... convection ovens do save you time and money to cook or reheat your food. strongly recommended. 4 stars as the bowel is thinner which may or may not be an issue. lower price than the FW is a +++

I am a 10-15 year veteran of Air Cooking. I wore out two NuWave Oven pro's. The Plastic yellows and cracks and gets harder to clean. This unit is Glass. clean easier heats faster. is easy to control. My hat goes off to the design engineers. I would pay twice this price for this quality unit. There may be some better units at multiple unit prices. Look no further. My Go wise is in storage. You can see the progress as things cooks. People who are giving negative reviews, must have had a defective unit. cheers

The manual is not very informative but anyhow the setup and operation is easy. Baked drum stick was my first trial and though it was not as crispy as I thought. However, it was juicy and that was out of my expectation.In addition, the cook time was the same as real frying but it saved me time because I left the fryer to do its job and I can perform other errands. Overall it was worth to buy.
Works not to bad, cooks well but any temp over 350 the heat lights will not turn off, never gets to operating temp.
